name: Aliens Onslaught
description: Choose from 3 unique fighter jet engines to pilot in this extremely fun 2D shoot em up.  As you progress through the game your ship will receive upgrades to its speed, maneuverability, number of cannons and even ammo based on your performance at slaughtering the alien horde. Dodge, duck and destroy all alien spacecraft with our custom two joystick user interface, one stick to steer and power your engines - the other to unload your lasers.
